00001 #ifndef __GameObjects_h_
00002 #define __GameObjects_h_
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include <OgreVector3.h>
00006 #include <OgreQuaternion.h>
00007 #include <OgreMath.h>
00008 #include "PhysicsEngine.h"
00009 
00010 using namespace Ogre;
00011 
00012 /**
00013  * PlayerShip represents a ship controllable by a human player which
00014  * can generate projectiles.
00015  */
00016 class PlayerShip : public PhysicsObject
00017 {
00018 private:
00019     /** The time which should elapsed between projectile generations */
00020     Real m_reloadTime;
00021 
00022     /** The time which has elapsed since the last projectile generation */
00023     Real m_lastShotCounter;
00024 
00025     /** Flag determining if the ship's weapons are currently loaded */
00026     bool m_canShoot;
00027 
00028     /** True if the left weapon should be used next, false if the right should be used */
00029     bool m_shootLeft;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     /** Construct a PlayerShip with the specified mass at the specified position */
00033     PlayerShip(Real mass, Vector3 position);
00034 
00035     /** Construct a PlayerShip with the specified mass at the origin */
00036     PlayerShip(Real mass);
00037 
00038     /** Copy constructor */
00039     PlayerShip(const PlayerShip& copy);
00040 
00041     /** @return True if the ship has a loaded weapon */
00042     bool canShoot() const;
00043 
00044     /** Generates a projectile PhysicsObject, and resets the ship's reload counter*/
00045     PhysicsObject generateProjectile();
00046 
00047     /** Updates the ship's position and reload status */
00048     void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed);
00049 };
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * Interface for listening on a GameArena instance.
00053  * This interface should be extended by classes which are interested in being notified
00054  * whenever an object is added to or removed from the game arena
00055  */
00056 class GameArenaListener
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     /** Called whenever a new PhysicsObject is generated in the GameArena */
00060     virtual void newPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object) = 0;
00061 
00062     /** Called just before a PhysicsObject is destroyed in the GameArena */
00063     virtual void destroyedPhysicsObject(PhysicsObject * object) = 0;
00064 };
00065 
00066 /**
00067  * GameArena represents a cube of space in which ships, projectiles, and other
00068  * objects should undergo physics simulation. The GameArena is responsible for
00069  * storing references to all involved PhysicsObjects, and notifying listeners
00070  * when new objects are created and destroyed.
00071  */
00072 class GameArena
00073 {
00074 private:
00075     /**
00076      * The size of the game arena.
00077      * Arenas are a cube centered on the origin, and each wall
00078      * is m_arenaSize units from the center (i.e. each wall of the cube
00079      * is 2 * m_arenaSize long).
00080      */
00081     Real m_arenaSize;
00082 
00083     /** A vector of pointers to dynamically allocated memory for all ships in the GameArena */
00084     std::vector<PlayerShip *> m_ships;
00085 
00086     /** A vector of pointers to dynamically allocated memory for all projectiles in the GameArena */
00087     std::vector<PhysicsObject *> m_projectiles;
00088 
00089     /** A vector of pointers to GameArenaListener instances registered with the GameArena*/
00090     std::vector<GameArenaListener *> m_listeners;
00091 public:
00092     /** Constructs a new, empty GameArena with the specified size. */
00093     GameArena(Real size);
00094 
00095     /** Registers a GameArenaListener with the GameArena */
00096     void addGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener);
00097 
00098     /** Unregisters a GameArenaListener from the GameArena */
00099     void removeGameArenaListener(GameArenaListener * listener);
00100 
00101     /**
00102      * Adds a PlayerShip to the GameArena.
00103      * Note: A copy of the passed PlayerShip is created and stored in dynamic memory.
00104      * @return  A pointer to the new copy of the PlayerShip. This pointer will remain valuid
00105      *          for the lifetime of the GameArena.
00106      */
00107     PlayerShip * addShip(PlayerShip ship);
00108 
00109     /**
00110      * Adds a projectile to the GameArena.
00111      * Note: A copy of the passed PhysicsObject is created and stored in dynamic memory.
00112      * @return  A pointer to the new copy of the PhysicsObject. This pointer will remain valuid
00113      *          for the lifetime of the GameArena.
00114      */
00115     PhysicsObject * addProjectile(PhysicsObject projectile);
00116 
00117     /** Destroys a projectile, erasing it from the vector of stored PhysicsObjects */
00118     bool destroyProjectile(PhysicsObject * projectile);
00119 
00120     /** @return The list of pointers to all active projectiles */
00121     std::vector<PhysicsObject *> * getProjectiles();
00122 
00123     /** @return The list of pointers to all active ships */
00124     std::vector<PlayerShip *> * getShips();
00125 
00126     /** 
00127      * @return A pointer to the PhysicsObject produced by generating a projectile from the passed ship 
00128      * and stored in dynamic memory.
00129      */
00130     PhysicsObject * fireProjectileFromShip(PlayerShip * ship);
00131 
00132     /** Updates the physics of all ships and projectiles in the arena */
00133     void updatePhysics(Real timeElapsed);
00134 };
00135 
00136 #endif
